attributes.action: Scrap the plans to tax car parking at work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the PM and the government to accept that they have lost all credibility and reality with the public. They now plan to tax workers using their company car parks. Enough is enough and we must state that this is NOT acceptable and hurts only the low to mid pay structure workers - those that can least afford this new tax. Introduce this tax and MORE jobs will be lost.
